files.help:
Export the following environment variables:

```bash
export R_LIBS_USER="$XDG_DATA_HOME"/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library
```

And/or append this line to the end of `/usr/lib/R/library/base/R/Rprofile`:

```R.libPaths( c( "$XDG_DATA_HOME/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/" , .libPaths() ) )```

**Disclaimer: You may need to re-install your libraries**
